Items.Script: The robot gathered its leg, now it moved much more smoothly. When it descended, it was met by a dense, impenetrable forest. The path through it to the castle will take too long - the traveler thought and decided to build a raft from improvised means: this is risky solution, but the river would be much easier to get to, especially when it flows in the right direction.
The robot entered the woods and began to collect materials: deadwood and sticks for the base, and flexible branches for the rope.
After dragging everything to the river, he realized that he had collected too many things and different sizes. To build an even raft, you need to understand all this diversity and sort the materials.
